name: Nova Centaurus
description:
Nova Centaurus is a tactical mission-based top-down shooter. Select your gear and launch the mission! The fate of the universe is in your hands. Master different weapons and upgrades. Compete against a variety of fearsome enemy ships. Two campaigns and the Infinite Mode await. Though your reflexes will be tested, it is your wits that will ultimately decide whether you achieve victory or nothing at all!

Use the mouse in the menus and the keyboard during the game. Arrow keys control movement and the Spacebar fires your weapon. Use the number keys to select a weapon. You can press Up a second time to activate the turbo jets. Finally, you can press Tab, Ctrl, or Shift to perform a 180-degree flip.
